messages.message:
Hi all — I’ve put together a document (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1plzmFAADu9rRg7uqX2M_EUd7okmtY5xtzcMFqV9PkzE/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.byaq98ylf7n) outlining the proposed approaches for upgrading RabbitMQ to *3.13*. Please take a moment to review it and share any concerns or feedback.
We’re aiming to proceed with these changes before this week’s certification, so your input ahead of time would be valuable.
